price: Nuko babwirwe bati “Ibyo mwajyaga musenga biri he?
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
